reviewText: Excellent instructional video , my son loved it. He was able to mimic some moves. Hope to see if there are more  videos from Israel Hernandez
Coach Israel has been called "the best Judo coach on US soil." We fully agree. There isn't a better video made about how to do Uchi Mata.
This is great for beginners. Technics have been explained very well. The video provides great visuals from various ankles to capture proper articulation of each movement.
A good video. Excellent lighting and good audio. This is a well thought out instruction on this throw and several of its variations for competition.
